data.title: Lebanon: country data and statistics
data.meta_description: Lebanon in numbers: demographics, economy, energy, climate and more data and comparisons with other countries.
data.text:
Geography

Lebanon is a country on the Near-Asian coast of the Mediterranean. The land has a total area of 10,450 km² (4,035 mi²) and a total coastline of 225 km (139.8 mi). This land area is approximately 100% of the area of Hawaii. Lebanon is thus one of the smallest countries in Asia by area and ranked 169th worldwide. With 512 inhabitants per km², it is also one of the most densely populated countries. An exceptionally high proportion of residents (89%) belongs to the urban population.
